thread.section_title: Vapornation Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vapornation | vapornation.com | 3 of 90
thread.title: V P

author: V P
title: V P
text: Excellent service. I recieved quick and helpful feedback from their email queue. I wasn't able to take advantage of their store wide discount, but they didn't turn me away--they offered it in the form of a credit of a customized gift tailored for my recent purchase. They had some shipping delays with my customized gift but were responsive when I followed up. I would buy from them again and recommend to others.
